definition: to the greatest extent/(when used before a noun of location) furthest or extreme/to be within the limits of/to give priority to

sentences.english: Everone can help protect the environment.
sentences.chinese: 人人都可以爲環境保護儘自已一份力。

sentences.english: I will dedicate myself to the Olympic Regatta to be held in my hometown.
sentences.chinese: 我要爲家鄉奧帆賽的舉辦儘自己的一份力量。

sentences.english: The ability to do their work wholeheartedly for the SSI.
sentences.chinese: 儘自己的能力全心全意爲SSI工作。

sentences.english: The Argentine does his best every day to earn continuity on the team.
sentences.chinese: 阿根廷人每天都儘自己最大努力來爭取連續出場時間。

sentences.english: He sleeps regardless of the noise outside.
sentences.chinese: 他儘自睡着，也不管外面吵鬧的聲音。

sentences.english: I try my best to treasure my spare time.
sentences.chinese: 我儘自己的最大努力珍惜分分秒秒。

sentences.english: I love teaching here and I always try my best to help others.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在沃爾得教書，並且儘自己最大努力幫助別人。

sentences.english: He resolved to make her the best husband he could.
sentences.chinese: 他決心儘自己的能力給她做一個最好的丈夫。

sentences.english: To be frank, even though I'm trying my best, I cannot do it.
sentences.chinese: 坦白講，儘管我儘自己的最大努力，也還是做不到。

sentences.english: The teacher is the silkworm, the last thread and self.
sentences.chinese: 老師是春蠶，吐儘自我最後一根絲線。

sentences.english: We can finished this job on time if everyone does his bit.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都儘自己的本份，我們就能按時完成這項工作。

sentences.english: The state of Oregon is doing its bit for that trade.
sentences.chinese: 俄勒岡州正在爲了這種貿易關係儘自己的一份力量。

sentences.english: We must contribute what we can afford.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須儘自己的能力做貢獻。
